title.en: Respiratory Engine of the Emerald Deep

description.ko: 유기적 생물 발광을 정교하게 탐구한 작품으로, 수중의 빈 공간에서 호흡기 생물학과 액체 빛이 융합된 살아있는 구조를 묘사합니다.
description.en: A highly detailed exploration of organic bioluminescence, depicting a living structure that merges respiratory biology with liquid light in an underwater void.

prompt: A cinematic, ultra-macro masterpiece of AURA-7, featuring a colossal, breathing respiratory engine formed from translucent #7FB069 moss and #2D5A3D vascular networks, pulsing with rhythmic #FFE66D liquid light. The structure is suspended in a deep-sea #2D5A3D trench, surrounded by drifting #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores. Intense subsurface scattering on the emerald membranes creates a soft, living glow. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of liquid light, volumetric light shafts piercing the dark green water, focusing on the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
